snippet.title: Transylvania walkthrough (Apple II - Polarware)
snippet.description:
Transylvania (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/transylvania) was a graphics adventure game published by Polarware in 1985 for the Apple ][. It was the first game in the Transylvania trilogy. The original game was published in 1982. This was a refreshed version using the Comprehend engine.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Walkthrough - www.solutionarchive.com
